title: Ukraine Government Websites Hit by Cyberattack
sub_head: Hack on ministry sites comes as Russia moves more troops near Ukraine and talks with West stall
body:
Ukraine said it was targeted by a massive cyberattack, amid a growing buildup of Russian troops and military equipment around its borders.
The websites of several ministries were hit, including the Foreign Ministry and the Ministry of Education and Science. A message posted on the Foreign Ministry’s home page in Ukrainian, Russian and Polish suggested users’ data had been compromised and uploaded online. “Be afraid and expect the worst,” the message read.
